name: Walk (Trikki)
description:
12 years of delay later, you are finally unlocked from the factory, that you were made in, and you must escape from the creators. Find your way back home, as a robot - Q000

You cannot donate yet, as the game is not finished, and it might not be. I am going to try though, this is my first game.

This game is safe. Even if Windows Smart Screen kicks in, it just doesn't like exe files from the web.
